webpdecoderjn

Class WebPDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • webpdecoderjn.WebPDecoder

  • public class WebPDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Decode a WebP image using native libraries.

    The native library libwebp_animdecoder (custom compiled for this from the libwebp project) needs to be made available before any decoding attempts. For supported platforms they are packed in the JAR and can be extracted using the init() function, which must be run before any of the decode or test functions. When not using init() JNA will look for the library in various places (consult the JNA docs for details).

    The functions using the native libraries may throw an UnsatisfiedLinkError. Since this is an error it is recommended to catch it explicitly instead of catching Error or Throwable.

      static class  WebPDecoder.WebPImage
      A decoded image containing the individual frames (for static images just one) and some meta info.
      static class  WebPDecoder.WebPImageFrame
      A single frame of a decoded image.

      • WebPDecoder

        public WebPDecoder()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This function is intended to be used before decoding is attempted (or test() is used). Extracts the platform dependent library from the JAR to a temp folder chosen by JNA.

        When this function is not used the regular native library discovery mechanism of JNA will be used.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When extracting a library fails, in which case it may not be possible to decode images
        See Also:
        init(boolean)

      • init

        public static void init(boolean nextToJar)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This function is intended to be used before decoding is attempted (or test() is used). Extracts the platform dependent library from the JAR to a temp folder chosen by JNA.

        When this function is not used the regular native library discovery mechanism of JNA will be used.

        Parameters:
        nextToJar - Check if the native library can be found next to the JAR (same directory) this class is contained in, otherwise extract from the JAR as normal
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When extracting a library fails, in which case it may not be possible to decode images

      • test

        public static boolean test()
        Same as testEx() but instead of throwing an exception it only return true or false.
        Returns:
        true if everything seems ok, false otherwise

      • testEx

        public static void testEx()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          WebPDecoder.WebPDecoderException,
                          java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError
        Decode a test image included in the JAR to check if the native libraries are properly loaded and if everything seems to work.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If loading the test image fails
        WebPDecoder.WebPDecoderException - If the decoder encounters an error
        java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError - When there was an issue loading the native libraries (note that this is an error, not an exception)

      • decodeUrl

        public static WebPDecoder.WebPImage decodeUrl(java.lang.String url)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              WebPDecoder.WebPDecoderException,
                                              java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError
        Decode a WebP image based on the url in the given String.
        Parameters:
        url - The url
        Returns:
        A decoded WebPDecoder.WebPImage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When loading the data from the url fails
        WebPDecoder.WebPDecoderException - When the decoder encounters an issue (e.g. if it's not a valid WebP file)
        java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError - When there was an issue loading the native libraries (note that this is an error, not an exception)

      • decode

        public static WebPDecoder.WebPImage decode(byte[] rawData)
                                    throws WebPDecoder.WebPDecoderException,
                                           java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError
        Decode a WebP image.
        Parameters:
        rawData - The raw bytes of the image
        Returns:
        A decoded WebPDecoder.WebPImage
        Throws:
        WebPDecoder.WebPDecoderException - When the decoder encounters an issue (e.g. if it's not a valid WebP file)
        java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError - When there was an issue loading the native libraries (note that this is an error, not an exception)
